casebody.data:
First Department,

May, 1949.

(May 3, 1949.) Thomas F. Mulligan, Appellant, v. City of New York, Respondent.

No opinion. Present — Peck, P. J., Dore, Cohn, Van Voorhis and Shientag, JJ.; Shientag, J., dissents and votes to reverse and grant plaintiff’s motion for judgment on the pleadings. [194 Misc. 579.]
